GAMES.EMPTY_GAME_LIST: There are no games available at the moment

GLOBAL.INVALID_CODE_TEXT: This code is invalid, maybe this game is not available at the moment, try again later.

LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Select the language you want to use in the app
LANGUAGE.TITLE: Language

CAMERA_PERMISSION.DESCRIPTION: This app needs access to your camera to scan tickets, you can use the app without this permission but you won't be able to scan tickets.
CAMERA_PERMISSION.TITLE: Camera permission

NOTIFICATIONS_PERMISSION.DESCRIPTION: This app needs access to your notifications to notify you about the results of the games, you can use the app without this permission but you won't receive any notifications.
NOTIFICATIONS_PERMISSION.TITLE: Notifications permission
NOTIFICATIONS_PERMISSION.DENIED: You don't have notifications permission, you can enable it in the app settings.

ERRORS.GENERAL: An error occurred while scanning the ticket, check if the ticket is valid or its already scanned.

MESSAGES.TAP_SCREEN_TO_SCAN: Tap the screen to scan a ticket

TICKETS.DELETE_TICKET_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete this ticket?
TICKETS.EMPTY_TICKET_LIST: You don't have any tickets yet. Try scanning one!

UUID.SYNC_DEVICE_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to sync this device?
UUID.DESYNC_DEVICE_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to desync this device?
